name: Robotato Friend!
description:
The High Empress of Gamma Prime is coming to dinner and you must peel 10,000 potatoes before 6 pm. Build a bot to peel those potatoes!

I built this Twine game in less than a day, as part of the Variety Megajam 2021 hosted by droqen · #varietymegajam

(Did I submit it? No. Why didn't I submit it? No idea. But I had fun making it! And I hope you have fun playing it. )

Average Play Time:  2 minutes

Feedback is always welcome!

Cover art created by pch.vector via freepik
